DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the sequential number assigned to a portion of the sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole._A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredDefinition: One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole.:A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.

Concepts.definition: One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole.
A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for initial GDC new CDE request. mc 8/26/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
